text:
Hi guys let me show you how to safely cut
and prepare a squash or pumpkin
let's have our hand out the way, we got this core here
get that off first, get the tip of our knife in the center

don't put too much body weight into it,  rock
it down, you're just taking on the fight

with half of it, then we can spin around
see that cut there? Put our knife back in keep it

sturdy, keep the fingers out the way, sharp blades
moving targets not very good

getting the seeds out, let's just use a spoon
these little seeds you can roast and of

course you can plant these, let's get it
on a flat edge hold one end, go in at one half

spin around and then go back to here, if you go
to a quarter you can use the same principle

if you want to cut it into different
slices remember we got a nice flat base

here that's how to tackle a big old
squash or pumpkin in a nice safe way
hope you found that useful, if you did then share it on your social media andif you want more tips click the link below
